title: Do the "Traditional" legacy skins ever come out of legacy temporarily, or have they ever?
body: I've wanted to get my hands on traditional karma since the day I began using her, and after countless mystery skin exchanges I'm frankly losing any hope of getting it XD. Do any of you guys know if these skins come out of legacy and are put on the store? I'm hoping they do because I'm spending $1,000,000,000,000 to make sure I get that skin :D

replies.body:
Hey FIuffCow,

We don't have plans to Traditional skins in the store this time. However, you can grab them via Mystery Gifts as you've mentioned.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=mj9wU5ds,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-03T01:04:05.009+0000)
>
> Hey FIuffCow,
> 
> We don't have plans to Traditional skins in the store this time. However, you can grab them via Mystery Gifts as you've mentioned.

Of all the things on these boards... a Rioter replies to something that directly translates to income for the company. How interesting...
95% sure it's because that's her area of expertise.
Yup! I'm a Content QA Analyst on the skins team, so I've got a bunch of skins-related knowledge. ^-^

> Of all the things on these boards... a Rioter replies to something that directly translates to income for the company. How interesting...

This is why they sometimes don't reply to things at all, because users like you come out and criticize anything they say.

> [{quoted}](name=Krigjer,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=mj9wU5ds,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-11-03T02:18:20.661+0000)
>
> This is why they sometimes don't reply to things at all, because users like you come out and criticize anything they say.

Eh, I'm not trying to be an ass or anything lol... but I look around the boards quite frequently as of the last week or two... and this is the 3rd time I've seen a Rioter post. The first outside of the player behavior board. Speaking of which, you'd think the player behavior one would see a lot of attention...

> [{quoted}](name=Letsatsi,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=mj9wU5ds,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-03T02:22:48.366+0000)
>
> I look around the boards quite frequently as of the last week or two... and this is the 3rd time I've seen a Rioter post. 

There is a red tracker by the sub-boards to the left, maybe take a look.

Just for a bit of clarification - I'm a Content QA Analyst on the skins team, so most of my knowledge is around skins and other personalized content such as wards, icons, etc. I stay away from places like the Gameplay boards because I couldn't tell you the first thing about balance. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=mj9wU5ds,comment-id=000000010002,timestamp=2015-11-03T20:32:55.873+0000)
>
> Just for a bit of clarification - I'm a Content QA Analyst on the skins team, so most of my knowledge is around skins and other personalized content such as wards, icons, etc. I stay away from places like the Gameplay boards because I couldn't tell you the first thing about balance. :P

Support mains know jack  squat about balance.

http://www.auplod.com/u/daopul5c344.png
I mean, I'm a one trick pony with Nami. :3
Nami mains unite and wash away the opposition.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=mj9wU5ds,comment-id=000000010002,timestamp=2015-11-03T20:32:55.873+0000)
>
> Just for a bit of clarification - I'm a Content QA Analyst on the skins team, so most of my knowledge is around skins and other personalized content such as wards, icons, etc. I stay away from places like the Gameplay boards because I couldn't tell you the first thing about balance. :P

Don't get me wrong Katey, I wasn't trying to directly attack you or anything. My intent might have come off wrong. It just seems like the more important posts in other threads go unanswered quite frequently.
No, no, just wanted to clarify. ^-^ No offense taken.

Is there a chance I can get Nottingham Ezreal ever again and bewitched Nidalee? I own all of the available skins for both of them and would like to complete the collection at this point. So also is snow leapord Nid coming back ever?

Bewitching Nidalee should be coming back when the Slayer/Jinx skins come out a bit later this patch. ^-^ Nottingham Ezreal and Snow Leopard Nidalee are also legacy and will periodically make their way back to the shop!
How about roadrunner missfortune? :(
Only Harrowing skins, AFAIK.
Thanks fam, is there anyway to set up an auto purchase on my account should those become available?
No dice on that one. D: They stick around for a good chunk of time (more than a week), so you have plenty of time to grab her!
Alright, thanks Katey! :D
You got it!
so can you get any skin through mystery even ones that are like boss and discontinued like black {{champion:12}} ?

Not all skins. 

 Achievement skins, Collector's Edition skins, PAX skins, Rusty Blitzcrank, Urf the Manatee, Championship Riven, Riot Kayle, and Riot Squad Singed are not available via Mystery Gifting.
ok but you can get ones that have been discontinued in the store for a long time if not achievement skins?
Legacy skins? Yes.

Obvious necromancer here; seemed like the most viable legacy skin thread so forgive me if I'm out of line...

NEED Mad sci Singed in my life...got discontinued right when I started playing before I knew I was a (casual) Singed main.  I have to lay my head on my pillow every night knowing that I'll never have Riot Singed.  

Any birdies Chirping about that one maybe being available?

edit; not gifted but vault sched?
I'm not sure when the vault is opening next. D: Mad Scientist Singed can most certainly come back. At this time, we don't have plans to make Riot Singed available.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/caution-snowstorm-sale-incoming Surprise surprise. :D
That feel when you can't say anything until it goes live. :P

Hey Katey! Just curious, you know the special, personalized deals for skins in Snowdown that are coming soon? Let's say I've every skin for Karma except for Tradtional by then... would it be possible for Traditional Karma to pop up there..? ;)
I believe the personalized store only shows skins that are currently in the store. Since Traditional Karma isn't currently available in the store, she wouldn't be available as a personalized offer.
Aw Alright, thanks though :)
Wow :O The Magnificent TF skin cause so much. I know it is rare but I didn't know its that valuable... I must have :O
It had Legendary standards back in the day, when Legendary skins didn't offer as much as they do today. :P
What about riot nasus?
He's legacy and is available via Mystery Gifting. Riot Blitzcrank, Graves and Kayle are also available via Mystery Gifting.
You sure about kayle? Yoi said she wasn't and then said her twice, not trying to sound rude just making sure we're not getting all mixed up n_n;

**EDITED:** 

She's not available. Sorry about the confusion here. D:

I received Riot Kayle through a mystery skin.
Is she no longer available through mystery skin gifting?
She may have been in the Mystery Skin bucket when she was available in the store, which may explain why you received it as a gift.
Maybe you mean Judgement Kayle? A few posts further down you say Riot Kayle is available via gifting ;)
Oh, crap. You're right. Things may have changed. >_> She's listed as not available. Sorry for the confusion.

don't worry, I was just wondering ^^

ps: I own both, lalala :P
what about riot susan{{champion:75}} sorry if this is a stupid question
He's legacy and is available via Mystery Gifting.
thx thats good to know
Just for clarity sake, what are the achievement skins?
As Tysmin said, they're the end of season reward skins (Victorious).
They are the skins you get at the end of the season if you get gold or higher

special rewards sins are usually excempt from mystery.

I think Black Alistar was a special reward for buying the boxed set or preorder or so.
